com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util
Class BoundingBox

java.lang.Object
  com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util.BoundingBox

public final class BoundingBox
extends Object

Bounding box abstraction, similar to Rect.

Constructor Detail

BoundingBox

public BoundingBox(double l,
                   double t,
                   double r,
                   double b)
Constructor for a bounding box. All coordinates are inclusive.

Parameters:
l - leftmost x-coordinate
t - topmost y-coordinate
r - rightmost x-coordinate
b - bottommost y-coordinate
Method Detail

intersectDestructively

public boolean intersectDestructively(BoundingBox bb)
Determines whether this bounding box intersects with the passed bounding box and, if so, mutates the bounding box to be the intersection. This was designed to behave the same as Rect.intersect(android.graphics.Rect).

Parameters:
bb - bounding box to intersect with this bounding box
Returns:
true if they intersect, false otherwise
